57b1964b04699.Name: CHD086 Payment Arrangements DD PDF
57b1964b04699.Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","name":"{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
Direct Debit Payment Arrangement ({reference})
@af:if({CSA/AuthenticationType}='fam')
@af:if({CSA/FS_Product}='Forms')
Worker:{CSA/CSAName}
@endaf:if
@af:if({CSA/FS_Product}='Service')
CSA:{CSA/CSAName}
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
Title {custdetails/Title}
First name{firstNamePlural} {custdetails/First_Name}
Last name {custdetails/Surname}
Address {custdetails/AddrTextArea}
Please provide at least one of the following methods to contact you
Email Address {custdetails/Email_Address}
Telephone Number {custdetails/Phone_Number}
Mobile Number {custdetails/Mobile_Number}
@af:if({cSA/FS_Product} = 'Service')
How was the contact made? {contactMade}
@endaf:if
Council Tax No. {W2_Ref_Num}
Outstanding Amount {TOutstandingAmount}
Customer making payment today {paymentToday}
@af:if({paymentToday} = 'yes')
Amount paid today {paidToday}
@endaf:if
Are any other payments being made before the Direct Debit start date? {otherNoneDDPay}
@af:if({otherNoneDDPay} = 'yes')
Next payment amount (not by Direct Debit) {noneDDPay}
Next payment date (not by Direct Debit) {dateOfNoneDirect}
@endaf:if
{firstPaymentDateL} Payment Date {FirstPaymentDate}
@af:if({warnWeekFort} = 'Warn')
Please pick a first payment date on a Friday as Weekly/Fortnightly payments are taken on Fridays
@endaf:if
@af:if({warnMonth} = 'Warn')
Please pick a first payment date on on the same day of the month as you have selected for payment day of the month
@endaf:if
@af:if({Over28D} = 'warning')
The first payment date should be within 28 days of today
@endaf:if
Which month would the customer like the last payment to be made in {clearedByMonth}
@af:if({balanceCleared} != 'no')
Select Payment Frequency {returnedList}
@af:if({returnedList} != '')
{firstPaymentDateL} Payment Amount: {firstPaymentAmount}
Subsequent Instalment Amount {subsequentAmount}
@endaf:if
@af:if({returnedList} = '')
{firstPaymentDateL} Payment Amount: {firstPaymentAmount1}
Subsequent Instalment Amount {subsequentAmount1}
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
What is the Frequency of Payments? {paymentFrequency}
@af:if({paymentFrequency} = 'Weekly')
Weekly or fortnightly instalments are collected on a Friday
@endaf:if
@af:if({paymentFrequency} = 'Fortnightly')
Weekly or fortnightly instalments are collected on a Friday
@endaf:if
@af:if({paymentFrequency} = 'Monthly')
Payment day of the month {PaymentDay}
@endaf:if
Will the Balance be Cleared by 31st March? {balanceCleared}
@af:if({balanceCleared} != 'no')
Please confirm you have set up the direct debit in Northgate {DDSetupNG}
@endaf:if
@af:if({DDSetupNG} = 'no')
Reason Direct Debit not set up in Northgate {DDnotSetup}
@endaf:if
@af:if({balanceCleared} != 'no')
Is the arrangement over 12 monthly installments? {twelveInstallments}
Does the customer want to have the next years account payable over 12 months? {nextYearTwelve}
Additional Notes {additionalNotes}
@endaf:if
@af:if({balanceCleared} = 'no')
Check with local taxation section before continuing
Have you checked this arrangement with local taxation? {checkedLocalTax}
@af:if({checkedLocalTax} = 'yes')
Who did you speak to in Local Taxation? {spokeToLocalTax}
@endaf:if
Frequency of Payments i.e. Montly, Weekly {LTFrequ}
@af:if({LTFrequ} != 'week')
@af:if({LTFrequ} = 'fortnightly')
Date in Month of Subsequent Payments {LTMonthDay}
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
Subsequent Instalment Amount {LTSubsequentAmount}
Is this arrangement over 12 monthly instalments? {LTTwelveMonthly}
Does the customer want to have the next years account payable over 12 Months? {LTNextYear}
Please confirm you have set up the direct debit in Northgate {DDSetupNG1}
@af:if({DDSetupNG1} = 'no')
Reason Direct Debit not set up in Northgate {DDnotSetup1}
@endaf:if
Other information regarding arrangement {otherInformationRe}
@endaf:if
"}

58ca773b44b4b.Name: LLP011 List adddresses to select from
58ca773b44b4b.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select CONCAT(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name,', ',town_name) as display, uprn as name
FROM llpgcache
WHERE 
(
(REPLACE(postcode, ' ','') = REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))
OR (concat(trim(concat(sao,' ',pao)),' ',street_name) like concat('%',{postcode_search_after},'%'))
)
AND length(REPLACE({postcode_search_after},' ',''))>5
AND postcode != ''
ORDER BY CAST(pao AS SIGNED),sao,street_name ASC LIMIT 300"}

58ca6c233f02c.Name: LLP015 Selected value to fields
58ca6c233f02c.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
	sao as flat_out,
	pao as house_out,
	street_name as street_out,
	town_name as town_out, 
	postcode as postcode_out5,
	uprn as uprn_out,
	lng as lng_out,
	lat as lat_out,
	{Choose_Address} as uprn_selected
FROM 
	llpgcache
WHERE 
	uprn = {Choose_Address}"}

58ca9f8575eb5.Name: PRO010 Load Profile info to SFG Cust Details
58ca9f8575eb5.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select * From
(select
	1 as IDZZ,
	1 as existSelected,
	1 as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	{flat} as flat_out,
	{house} as house_out,
	{street} as street_out,
	{town} as town_out, 
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom','',{postcode}) as postcode_out5,
	if({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom',{postcode},'') as zIPPostcode,
	{country} as country_out,
	{country_id} as sel_country,
	{uprn} as uprn_out,
	{lng} as lng_out,
	{lat} as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAi' as haveRun
union select
	2 as IDZZ,
	'' as existSelected,
	'' as existingCustomer,
	{Organisation_Name} as Organisation_Name_out,
	{Title} as Title_out,
	{First_Name} as First_Name_out,
	{Surname} as Surname_out,
	'' as flat_out,
	'' as house_out,
	'' as street_out,
	'' as town_out, 
	'' as postcode_out5,
	'' as zIPPostcode,
	'' as country_out,
	'' as sel_country,
	'' as uprn_out,
	'' as lng_out,
	'' as lat_out,
	{Date_of_Birth} as Date_of_Birth_out,
	{Email_Address} as Email_Address_out,
	{Mobile_Number} as Mobile_Number_out,
	{Phone_Number} as Phone_Number_out,
	'ProAe' as haveRun) Combine
Where
	IDZZ = (select if({subParm} like '%dA%' 
			and {subParm} not like '%oNA%'
			and {postcode} is not null ,1,2) as test)"}

58cac46f269a2.Name: LLP017 Change to Use Customer Recorded
58cac46f269a2.Output_template:
{"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","lookup_validation":"0","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes","query":"select
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {flat}, '') as flat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {house}, '') as house_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {street}, '') as street_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {town}, '') as town_out, 
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NULL or {country} = '' or {country} = 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as postcode_out5,
	IF(({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%')
		and ({country} IS NOT NULL and {country} != '' and {country} != 'United Kingdom')), {postcode}, '') as zIPPostcode,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {country}, '') as country_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {uprn}, '') as uprn_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lng}, '') as lng_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), {lat}, '') as lat_out,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existSelected,
 IF({existingCustomer} = 1 or ({subParam} like '%dA%' and {haveRun} like '%Ae%'), 1, '') as existingCustomer,
 'ProcAi' as haveRun"}

58efbd46c0cbd.Name: LLP018 Confirm the entered address
58efbd46c0cbd.Output_template: {"systemID":"59a4f21090a7f","systemName":"Firmstep Solutions Read","query":"select a.*, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'Entered','') as uprn_selected, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',1) as Address_Found, if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 - b.p4 > 2,'',concat(if(b.p1 + b.p2 + b.p3 < 3,'The address must contain a flat or house number, road and postcode. ',''),if(b.p4 = 1,' The postcode must contain a space, for e.g. "PO1 2AL"',''))) as confMsg, '' as confirmAddress, b.* from (select 123 as id, {flat_out1} as flat_out, {house_out1} as house_out, {street_out1} as street_out, {town_out1} as town_out, {postcode_out51} as postcode_out5, {zIPPostcode1} as zIPPostcode, {country_out1} as country_out, {sel_country} as country_id_out, '' as uprn_out, '' as lng_out, '' as lat_out, '' as existSelected, '' as existingCustomer) as a RIGHT JOIN (select if(c.p1 + c.p2 + c.p3 - c.p4 > 2,'123','321') as id, c.* from (select if({flat_out1} != '' or {house_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p1, if({street_out1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%',0,1)) as p2, if({postcode_out51} != '' or {zIPPostcode1} != '',1,if({subParam} like '%mAd%' or {subParam} like '%mPo%',0,1)) as p3, if({postcode_out51} REGEXP '(((^[BEGLMNSbeglmns][1-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww][2-9])|(^([Aa][BLbl]|[Bb][ABDHLNRSTabnhlnrst]|[Cc][ABFHMORTVWabfhmortvw]|[Dd][ADEGHLNTYadeghlnty]|[Ee][HNXhnx]|[Ff][KYky]|[Gg][LUYluy]|[Hh][ADGPRSUXadgprsux]|[Ii][GMPVgmpv]|[JEje]|[Kk][ATWYatwy]|[Ll][ADELNSUadelnsu]|[Mm][EKLekl]|[Nn][EGNPRWegnprw]|O[LXlx]|[Pp][AEHLORaehlor]|[Rr][GHMghm]|[Ss][AEGKL-Paegkl-pRSTWYrstwy]|[Tt][ADFNQRSWadfnqrsw]|[Uu][Bb]|[Ww][ADFNRSVadfnrsv]|YO|ZE|yo|ze)[0-9][0-9]?)|(^[Ww]1[A-Ha-hJKSTUWjkstuw0-9])|(((^[Ww][Cc][1-2])|(^[Ee][Cc][1-4])|(^[Ss][Ww]1))[ABEHMNPRVWXYabehmnprvwxy]))[_ ]([0-9][ABD-Habd-hJLNP-Ujlnp-uW-Zw-z]{2}))$|(^[Gg][Ii][Rr][_ ]0[Aa]{2})$',0,if({postcode_out51} != '',1,0)) as p4) as c) as b ON a.id = b.id","results_page_columns_db":"","secure_fields_db_database":"","escapeTokens":"yes"}

props.label: html 1
props.content:
Council tax payers are automatically set up to pay their bill across 10 months of the year with no payments in February or March.

The quickest and easiest way to make sure your council tax bill is always paid on time is to set up a Direct Debit. You can choose to make 12 monthly payments when completing the Direct Debit set up form.

If you would prefer to change to 12 monthly payments, but not pay by Direct Debit, please continue and complete this proposal form.

If you don't pay by Direct Debit, your payments will be due on the first day of each month and you will need to make a payment by that date each month. We won't send you any further bills or reminders unless you miss a payment and your account is in arrears.

Before you complete this form

You will need your council tax reference number (stated on your council tax bill) to complete this process.
